thread.title: Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder
thread.title_full: Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder

author: MICHAEL MAROT
title: Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder
text:
Colts confident Luck will play vs Jags despite sore shoulder Associated Press 5 hrs ago By MICHAEL MAROT < PREVIOUS SLIDE SLIDE 1 of 4 NEXT SLIDE > Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck (12) leaves the field after beating the Tennessee Titans in an NFL football game Sunday, Sept. 27, 2015, in Nashville, Tenn. The Colts won 35-33. (AP Photo/Mark Zaleski) Â© (AP Photo/Mark Zaleski INDIANAPOLIS (AP) Colts coach Chuck Pagano is confident quarterback Andrew Luck will play Sunday against Jacksonville despite a sore right shoulder.
AdChoices Luck has taken a beating this season. He's been sacked five times and taken 10 other hits. He was a limited participant in Wednesday's practice.
After last weekend's 35-33 victory at Tennessee, speculation mounted that Luck might have hurt his ribs. But Luck downplayed those suggestions Monday. He told reporters he only had the normal bumps and bruises players get in the NFL.
Luck, the top pick in the 2012 draft, has started 57 straight games including the playoffs.
